channel.title: Comments on: Writing another chapter in my career book
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Yashwant
item.dc:creator: Yashwant
item.description: Congrats Jes!! Keep Smiling & Shining, Keep Growing !! Best Wishes!!
item.content:encoded:
Congrats Jes!!
Keep Smiling & Shining, Keep Growing !!
Best Wishes!!

item.title: By: chopstik
item.dc:creator: chopstik
item.description: Belatedly, CONGRATULATIONS!!! And I'm sure you realized that the Star Wars lunchbox was the appropriate one... I think we need to all bring our Star Wars lunchboxes to our next LTD Summit... :-)
item.content:encoded: Belatedly, CONGRATULATIONS!!! And I’m sure you realized that the Star Wars lunchbox was the appropriate one… I think we need to all bring our Star Wars lunchboxes to our next LTD Summit… ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Grant Fritchey
item.dc:creator: Grant Fritchey
item.description:
A little late to this, but...
HUGE CONGRATULATIONS JES!!!!
Yet another step in your plans to take over the world. I'm enjoying your progress.
item.content:encoded:
A little late to this, but…

HUGE CONGRATULATIONS JES!!!!

Yet another step in your plans to take over the world. I’m enjoying your progress.

item.title: By: Surly Dev
item.dc:creator: Surly Dev
item.description:
I reckon whichever one you use it'll look like you are going on holiday with a novelty suitcase.
Sorry, that was a gag about your diminutive stature.
Congrats about the new job, and :O <-- surprised face when I saw you had changed your job.
item.content:encoded:
I reckon whichever one you use it’ll look like you are going on holiday with a novelty suitcase.

Sorry, that was a gag about your diminutive stature.

Congrats about the new job, and :O <– surprised face when I saw you had changed your job.

item.title: By: Kevin Boles
item.dc:creator: Kevin Boles
item.description:
Why limit yourself, Jes?!? I think you should take BOTH lunch boxes!
Hope you are doing well and that you thrive at the new gig.
Talk with you soon!
item.content:encoded:
Why limit yourself, Jes?!? I think you should take BOTH lunch boxes!

Hope you are doing well and that you thrive at the new gig.

Talk with you soon!

item.title: By: Mark Freeman
item.dc:creator: Mark Freeman
item.description: Enjoy your new chapter. I hope your new coworkers enjoy karaoke! :-)
item.content:encoded: Enjoy your new chapter. I hope your new coworkers enjoy karaoke! ðŸ™‚

item.description: Congrats. Have fun at the new gig!
item.content:encoded: Congrats. Have fun at the new gig!

item.title: By: genomon
item.dc:creator: genomon
item.description: Congrats! I think Wonder Woman would be apropo. Plus you get a cool invisible jet that way!
item.content:encoded:
Congrats!
I think Wonder Woman would be apropo. Plus you get a cool invisible jet that way!

item.title: By: Jack Corbett
item.dc:creator: Jack Corbett
item.description: Congatulations. I checked out the web site and it doesn't list SQL Server, I'm sure you are on board to change that!
item.content:encoded: Congatulations. I checked out the web site and it doesn’t list SQL Server, I’m sure you are on board to change that!
